typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPLID as string,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		USER_TYPE as string,
		REG_TEMP as string,
		FULL_PART_TIME as string,
		EMPL_STATUS as string,
		EMPL_STATUS_DESC as string,
		TELEPHONE as string,
		TELEPHONE_EXT as string,
		FAX_NUMBER as string,
		C_CELL_PHONE as string,
		EMAILID as string,
		SETID_LOCATION as string,
		LOCATION as string,
		LOCATION_DESCR as string,
		LOCATION_CITY as string,
		LOCATION_STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIP_CODE as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		COMPANY_DESCR as string,
		DIVISION_CD as string,
		DESCR_DIVISION as string,
		GROUP_CD as string,
		GROUP_CD_DESCR as string,
		SETID_JOBCODE as string,
		JOBCODE as string,
		JOBTITLE as string,
		SETID_DEPT as string,
		DEPTID as string,
		DEPTNAME as string,
		ESTABID as string,
		ESTAB_DESCR as string,
		COST_CTR_NAME as string,
		COST_CTR as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		MGR_FIRST_NAME as string,
		MGR_LAST_NAME as string,
		MGR_FULL_NAME as string,
		MGR_EMAIL as string,
		HIRE_DT as string,
		C_FACIL_BLDG_CD as string,
		SUBDIVISION_CD as string,
		C_SUBDIVI_DESCR as string,
		SUBGROUP_CD as string,
		C_SUBGRP_DESCR as string,
		MANAGER_LEVEL as string,
		DESCR_MGR_LEVEL as string,
		IS_SALES as string,
		PAY_EXPAT_IND as string,
		EEO4_FUNCTION as string,
		JOB_FAMILY as string,
		CONSULTING_FIRM as string,
		CREATE_DATE as string,
		BUSINESS_UNIT as string,
		PREFERRED_NAME as string,
		DISPLAY_NAME as string,
		LAST_DATE_WORKED as string,
		RANK as string,
		UUID as string,
		ACCOUNT_STATUS as string,
		BAND as string,
		EMPL_CLASS as string,
		OFFICE_STREET_ADDRESS as string,
		GENDER as string,
		FLSA_STATUS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(FULL_NAME = sha2(256,columns())) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EMPLID as string,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		USER_TYPE as string,
		REG_TEMP as string,
		FULL_PART_TIME as string,
		EMPL_STATUS as string,
		EMPL_STATUS_DESC as string,
		TELEPHONE as string,
		TELEPHONE_EXT as string,
		FAX_NUMBER as string,
		C_CELL_PHONE as string,
		EMAILID as string,
		SETID_LOCATION as string,
		LOCATION as string,
		LOCATION_DESCR as string,
		LOCATION_CITY as string,
		LOCATION_STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIP_CODE as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		COMPANY_DESCR as string,
		DIVISION_CD as string,
		DESCR_DIVISION as string,
		GROUP_CD as string,
		GROUP_CD_DESCR as string,
		SETID_JOBCODE as string,
		JOBCODE as string,
		JOBTITLE as string,
		SETID_DEPT as string,
		DEPTID as string,
		DEPTNAME as string,
		ESTABID as string,
		ESTAB_DESCR as string,
		COST_CTR_NAME as string,
		COST_CTR as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		MGR_FIRST_NAME as string,
		MGR_LAST_NAME as string,
		MGR_FULL_NAME as string,
		MGR_EMAIL as string,
		HIRE_DT as string,
		C_FACIL_BLDG_CD as string,
		SUBDIVISION_CD as string,
		C_SUBDIVI_DESCR as string,
		SUBGROUP_CD as string,
		C_SUBGRP_DESCR as string,
		MANAGER_LEVEL as string,
		DESCR_MGR_LEVEL as string,
		IS_SALES as string,
		PAY_EXPAT_IND as string,
		EEO4_FUNCTION as string,
		JOB_FAMILY as string,
		CONSULTING_FIRM as string,
		CREATE_DATE as string,
		BUSINESS_UNIT as string,
		PREFERRED_NAME as string,
		DISPLAY_NAME as string,
		LAST_DATE_WORKED as string,
		RANK as string,
		UUID as string,
		ACCOUNT_STATUS as string,
		BAND as string,
		EMPL_CLASS as string,
		OFFICE_STREET_ADDRESS as string,
		GENDER as string,
		FLSA_STATUS as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
